column2: Alif-Lam-Mi This is the book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah, who believe in the unseen, established prayer, and spend of what we have provided for them.

for them, and who believe in what has been revealed to you, O Muhammad, and what has been revealed before you, and of the hereafter, they are certain in faith. Those are upon right guidance from their Lord and Master.

and it is those who are the successful. Indeed, those who disbelieve, it is all the same for them. Whether you warn them or do not warn them, they will not believe. Allah has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their minds.

upon their hearing and over their vision is a veil. And for them is a great punishment. And of the people are some who say, we believe in Allah and the last day, but they are not believers. They think to deceive us.

for you the earth a bed and the sky a ceiling and sent down from the sky rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allah equals while you know.
